name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: ACID Boot Camp Set / ACID特別体験入隊セット / ACID特別體驗入隊禮包
detailed_description:
Add Marks, Medals, Party Points, and items with the special ACID Boot Camp Set.

The following will be added:
・[1000] Marks
・[10] Medals
・[50] PP
・[10,000] Marks
・[25] Medals
・[100] PP
・[500,000] Marks
・[50] Medals
・[150] PP

The following items will be added:
・Energy Pill SP x 3
・Energy Pack SP x 3
・Deepas Medicine SP x 3
・Deepas Pack SP x 3
・Remedine Pack EX x 3
・Activator x 3
・Hard Upper x 3
・Act Upper x 3
・Power Upper x 3
・Aim Upper x 3
・Stamina Upper x 3
・Memory Upper x 3
・Speed Upper x 3
・Technical Upper x 3
・Portable Camoflauge Device x 3

・Energy Pill EX x 3
・Energy Pack EX x 3
・Deepas Medicine EX x 3
・Deepas Pack EX x 3
・Remedine Pack Max x 3
・Activator Max x 5
・Hard Upper x 5
・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5
・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5
・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5
・Technical Upper x 5
・Portable Analysis Device x 3

・Rob Fiber
・Seek Fiber
・Technical Fiber
・Hard Booster x 5
・Act Booster x 5
・Power Booster x 5
・Aim Booster x 5
・Stamina Booster x 5
・Memory Booster x 5
・Speed Booster x 5
・Technical Booster x 5

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.

short_description: Add Marks, Medals, Party Points, and items with the special ACID Boot Camp Set.

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Процессор: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 6 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10 64bit
  • Процессор: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
